features: Interactive Home Page: Engage users with a visually appealing and interactive home page.
User Authentication: Implement Login and SignUp page for personalized experiences.
TMDB API Integration: Seamlessly integrate TMDB (The Movie Database) API for up-to-date movie information.
Diverse Categories: Explore a wide range of movie categories, including Trending, Netflix Originals, Action Movies, Comedy Films, and Horror entertainers.
Movie Like Button: Allow users to express their preferences with a 'Like' button for each movie.
Responsive Design: Ensure a consistent and enjoyable user experience across various devices with a responsive design.
Implement Login and SignUp page for personalized user experiences.
Provide personalized dish suggestions based on user preferences.
Enable smooth and efficient page routing for seamless navigation.
